prompts: Create a sun-themed Pokemon with bright orange and gold colors, resembling a celestial body.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the energy of the sun, with spiky rays and a vibrant face.
Generate an otherworldly creature that glows like a star, featuring an orange body and radiating light.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a shining sun, with a round shape and sharp, star-like protrusions.
Imagine a mystical Pokemon inspired by solar energy, showcasing a bright orange core and golden accents.
Design a sun-like Pokemon that has a fierce yet friendly expression, surrounded by golden spikes.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the sun, with an orange body and a star-like appearance.

distinctive_features: Color gradient from orange to yellow
